read-lorems-ipsums: SELECT lorems.*, ipsums.blabla AS ipsum FROM lorems LEFT JOIN ipsums ON ipsums.lorem = lorems.id
read-lorem-ipsums: SELECT lorems.*, ipsums.blabla AS ipsum FROM lorems JOIN ipsums ON ipsums.lorem = lorems.id AND lorems.id = ?
create-result-table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS results (result_id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,username CHAR(30),result int(11),PRIMARY KEY (result_id))
read-high-scores: SELECT  username, result FROM results ORDER BY result DESC LIMIT 10
create-current-game-table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS current_game (username varchar(45) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', row varchar(45) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', score int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (username,row))
update-score: UPDATE current_game SET score = ? WHERE username = ? AND row = ?
create-turn-table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS turn(player_index INT(6) PRIMARY KEY)
delete-game-row: DELETE FROM current_game WHERE username = ? AND row = ?
